articles.title: ‘Landslide’: Santana beats out Baker, Wu says, while Culpepper wins D7
articles.description:
Rev. Miniard Culpepper, a newcomer, will take the only seat on the council without an incumbent since Tania Fernandes Anderson stepped down.

The post ‘Landslide’: Santana beats out Baker, Wu says, while Culpepper wins D7 appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Rev. Miniard Culpepper wins the only open Boston council seat in District 7.
Santana defeats Baker in a significant election result for Boston's political landscape.
Culpepper's victory marks a shift in representation for Boston residents in District 7.

articles.title: Jake Wilson to be Somerville’s next mayor, unofficial results show
articles.description:
Wilson received the most votes in September’s preliminary election, with his campaign running on the goal of “building a Somerville that works for everyone,” according to his website. 

The post Jake Wilson to be Somerville’s next mayor, unofficial results show appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Jake Wilson won the preliminary election for Somerville mayor with a focus on inclusivity.
Wilson's campaign emphasizes building a community that works for all residents of Somerville.
His election may lead to significant policy changes benefiting local residents starting in 2025.
